      • getFields

        public static IGraph getFields(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                        throws Exception
        Read GET and POST data from the incoming HTTP request and put that in a Graph. Important: only name=value pairs are taken into account. The parameter name can be preceeded by a type specifier (type:name). Some types are transformed into their corresponding classes ('list','oid'). In any case, the type specifier is copied into the node type attribute. Object trees can be specified by using paths instead of simple names (example: "d.name.a"). Objects are ordered if they have an integer attribute '__order' . [!] The form data is decoded with URLDecoder, assuming it comes in UTF-8
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getFiles

                       throws Exception
        RFC1867 file attachments (multipart/form-data handling, also fields) Using Apache Commons FileUpload for RFC1867 handling

      • order

        public static IGraph order(IGraph g)
                    throws Exception
        Deprecated. 
        arrange the graph nodes in ascending __order. Used to add order to HTML FORM objects.
        Throws:
        Exception
